Text:
Ah thank you! I've been searching for this game for months, seems all other torrents are dead.

The downloadrate isnt very good thou :/
Well the torrent is new and since theres only 1 seed the rate of it is slow, but on the bright side, its only 221mb so more seeders should be there soon :)
lemme know if it works with xp, there are som tricks if it doesnt.
seed plz i need this game
Works fine under win xp, just run regsetup and setup to configure the game :)

I was just pm'ed by someone who downloaded this game, who told me that it asked for the correct CD to play.. again guys.. Before you play the game make sure you run regsetup.exe and setup.exe to configure the game.. just tested this on a fresh install on my laptop and it worked perfectly
Seed plz, don't want to wait 4 hours :S

what do you mean with all the parts.. theres only 1 rar file?

i want to know one thing why do they not use insect spray to kill the bugs? (joking)

It runs just fine under XP, but there are no videos and music...=(

can someone help, i have the same problem as nakatome. i unziped it, there were 12 rar files, i unziped the first one (which unzips all of them) ran setup & reg, try to start the game and get an error! am i doing something wrong? pleeeeaase help. ive been looking for this game for years
if anyone can help with the above problem my email is jaydand@hotmail.co.uk. thanks

I get to the menu no options show up or the game crashes.
